text: Martin Faranan McDonagh (; born 26 March 1970) is a British-Irish playwright, screenwriter, producer, and director. He has been nominated for an Academy Award for Best Director and won four BAFTA Awards, three Laurence Olivier Awards. He was nominated for five Tony Awards. He directed the dark comedy movies In Bruges (2008), Seven Psychopaths (2012), Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017), and The Banshees of Inisherin (2022). ==References== Category:BAFTA Award winning writers Category:Golden Globe Award winning writers Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:British playwrights Category:Irish playwrights Category:Irish screenwriters Category:Irish movie directors Category:Irish movie producers Category:Movie producers from London Category:Movie directors from London Category:Screenwriters from London Category:People from Camberwell
title: Martin McDonagh
